Comments :
A mysterious man, Suba, gets himself a job at a fencing academy, and 
as he learns the way of the students, the school, and its maestro, 
they learn that there&#039;s more to him than meets the eye. He gains (or regains?) his fencing skills and his philosophy of teaching clashes 
with the maestro&#039;s. As they are thrown into conflict, Suba and the 
maestro&#039;s past appear to be linked. And the resolution of their 
mysterious relationship may be a duel to the death.
Director : Jeremy Kagan
          
Writers: James Donadio
         John McDonald
